name: Jan Mooney
text: Love their products

name: Hyeyoung Nam
text: Bad buiseness They don't know how to return the online purchase item.

name: Jen Arndt
text: Nice

name: Chris Lee
text: “They have wigs, extensions, make-up, gorgeous fashion jewelry, hair products, and much more at affordable prices.”

name: mary trammell
text: Friendly service and wonderful products

name: Laken Kei
text: The owner was really nice and knowledge on my visit 01/05/17

name: Kawren Jayo
text: I actually really like to go to this store due to their prices being good but they don't have good customer over the telephone.

name: Chelsey full of life jenkins
text: Good place for hair

name: Markeda Dallas
text: Owner is Awesome

name: Jay Rock
text: Great Pharmacy to shop

name: Nikki Steele
text: Love this store! It is one of the smaller stores, as they only get one truck per two weeks but they have a super helpful staff. I coupon here all the time and never have an issue getting my sale items. They always resolve my issues and are willing to help when possible.

name: Patty Griffith
text:
After several managers had come and gone from the CVS on Chalkville Mountain Road and Grayson Valley Parkway there have been no improvements. I would frequently go in the store, which is right near my home and I would find a bell that said “ring for service”.  No one would come when I would ring the bell. I had to go hunting for someone to purchase my items.  There would be nobody at the front and nobody in sight; I would holler “hello, hello” and nobody would respond.  I finally found someone and asked who was the manager and was told the manager was Jimmy Jackson.  Every employee in there that has been fired and then rehired or hired in the first place has been rude, obnoxious and very unhelpful in every way. The shelves are always I stocked. When I go in to get my cat litter there is never any on the shelf; and I’ll ask if they’ll go back in the back, after they huff and puff, they will and come back and say “truck day is tomorrow.” When they say truck day is tomorrow it’s always on a different day.
As I went in there four days later, the shelves  were the same and they still did not have my cat litter. I politely asked the gentleman behind the counter if they had any in the back. The young lady behind the counter next to him said “she’s always like this” to another customer who was standing next to me. I have never been so humiliated and embarrassed the employees name was Cam. I will not be back.
If I could give this store a zero I gladly would.

name: Michele Smith
text:
The pharmacist is the most hateful lady I have ever talked to. I understand  your tired but  i just  ask a real simple question.  I will never fo to this store again
Not to mention  they are very nasty (dirty) and never restock.
Over CVS.

name: R “Kelz” Kelz
text:
Over the past month or so the pharmacy at this location that use to be great A+ about getting your prescriptions out on time as promised and I would even get an alert on my phone when they were ready to pick up but lately it’s the total opposite.
What has happened?
Prescriptions are promised to be ready at a certain time and when you go to pick up those prescriptions at that promised time they still aren’t ready so you have to wait in line behind other customers with promised unfilled orders. What’s the point of telling a customer to wait 5 hours and it’ll be ready at 7:00 when you get there at 7:00 it’s not. If things don’t change soon I’ll be going somewhere else with my prescriptions. Customer service is always #1 and this CVS pharmacy isn’t providing that.

name: Mick McMeme
text: This is a CVS in decline, the refrigeration units are failing, there's a fair amount of disorder and they are understaffed.

name: Robin Cooper
text: Prescription not filled timely.

name: Melissa Bowman
text: This is by far the worst pharmacy i have ever dealt with. They are ridiculously slow, WILL NOT answer the phone, and if you don't get there at least 1 hour before they close, they will not fill your medicine. which presents a HUGE problem when you work 8 am - 6:30 pm, and cannot get there and they WONT ANSWER THE PHONE EVER!!!! and then to be rude about it on top of it all!

name: Ashley Jones
text: Very helpful staff, great coupons and if you download their app, you can save even more! Shop here almost daily!

name: J. Bobbs
text: I am not sure what has changed about this pharmacy, but something has. They are rude inside and drive-thru.  They will put you on hold and then just hang up. They always have a nasty attitude, as if they HATE their job. It's time to move on!

name: Toni Davison
text: All of the pharmacy staff are helpful and I feel like they take exceptional care of me and my family.

name: Sigrid Corn
text: I have been trying to get an actual person on the phone for 2 days to ask a question about my prescription!

name: Rebecca Bryant
text: They always have my prescriptions ready when they say they will be and are always very helpful. Bonus- we have found they cost less than other pharmacies in the area.

name: Blake Boo
text: Always Rude at pharmacy drive thru

name: Jason Collins
text: Forces you to stay in the store for 20 minute refill but if you leave the store it takes 90 minutes. I suppose they think that you will buy something in that time.

name: A M (Easymac)
text: Slow pharmacy. Redbox is always broken too.

name: Stacy Brunner
text: Close to home

name: Writer anon616
text:
These Pharmacy techs are awesome and always have a great attitude.

I love coming here there is never any confusion.

Always knowledgable and always have my prescription on time!  Thank you ladies and gentleman!

name: Jay Rock
text: The Pinson Walgreens is a store with friendly customer service and there’s always a smiling face to greet you .

name: Josh kaley
text: Mixed opinions.  Had a female cashier that was great, very friendly and went out of her way to help.   The pharmacy on the other hand, bad attitudes and not very helpful.  They just want to fill scripts and be left alone.  I usually go somewhere else

name: Amanda Bruton
text: Walgreens is always on top of everything! I never seem to wait on line for anything. They are quick and efficient with prescriptions and there is never a line to check out. The store stays clean and they keep the shelves stocked really well. The manager helped me find everything I needed plus a little more.

name: Makynleigh Adderhold
text: The male pharmacist that I dealt with is incompetent! Very rude and unprofessional!!! I would rather chew off my arm then deal with him ever again. The woman are awesome! Thanks to the “man” I will no longer use this pharmacy. He is not right for the line of work he is in.

name: Michael Myers
text:
Couldn't ask for better photo help. Lady at front desk was very helpful and courteous.
She was effecient and help me much.
Made my dead lines. CVS's photo machines were down at three locations.. Thank you Walgreens photo lady. 11-18-19 @ 10:30am.

name: Erica
text: They are always friendly when you walk in, you can find a lot of things on sale or marked down

name: Danny Joiner
text: Used to be Rite Aid. Same employees mostly. Never had any issues with refills or knowledgeable help from the pharmacist.

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Friendly and helpful staff

name: Sose Knows Best
text: Just moved to Pinson and I was wanting to transfer my RX to this Walgreens but after sitting on hold for over 30 minutes, I hung up and called Publix down the road and spoke with a pharmacist with no wait.

name: elaine sellers
text: I just want to take a moment to praise the helpful and good hearted women at this boutique. There is a reason Ruby Blue has been around for years. Service. Prices. Selection, all fantastic. No other shop in Mobile has as much of a selection all at fair prices. good experience all around. will continue to shop

name: Tracy Boyler
text: I've been to a lot of these stores, but Ruby Blue is the nicest. Here  clothes are Unique rather then  the same and Customer Service is great. We all are human and have our off days. But the staff will always tries to help you.

name: Clara Gandy
text: Best staff and owner with the best prices ever!

name: Alma J. McEvoy
text: I just love Ruby Blue. Every time I stop in I find just the cutest outfits. I tried out the Bombistry bath bombs for the first time and now I'm completely addicted! The ladies at Ruby Blue really are the sweetest and will do whatever it takes to help you find the styles you have been looking for.

name: Kinsley Welch
text: Super friendly staff who remember you, and they have cool boutique style clothes

name: Jennifer delaune
text: Love this place! Reasonable prices! Beautiful items! ❤️❤️

name: Jany Clay
text: Ruby Blue always clean and organized. Staff is friendly. Price are economical so I can go by all the time.

name: Randi Evans
text: Such a cute store! Everyone there is so helpful! I definitely would recommend this beautiful boutique to anyone!

name: Quinn and Carson Kennedy
text: Love this place!!💜💜💜

name: Alissa Lightfoot
text: Watch out! There is a yellow jacket nest by the pharmacy drive through window.  This sweet, wonderful lady working the window grabbed a basket to defend me! Not all heros wear capes. Best experience I've had yet. Thank you lady! I hope she is always there. Great attitude and sense of humor. THANK YOU!

name: DeShawn Gentry
text: Just walked through OUT the WHOLE store and NOT one person is on the floor to answer any questions. Walked to the front of the store than a voice comes on over the intercom, but NO ONE still APPEARED from the BACK

name: William Bennett
text: Front end staff is friendly and courteous. Great place to shop and get pharmacy needs.

name: Ashley Snell
text: I get medication filled here and the pharmacy staff is amazing. Especially the head pharmacist Richard Seagraves he is very friendly and so is the rest of the crew. I will continue to do business here for some time. It's a nice clean place

name: Tasha Sales
text: I needed to go to a nearby ATM and they had one.

name: Jacqueline Wade
text: Given COVD issues, prior to closure Pharmacist Richard asked me to leave the drive-through window and go inside so he could close the drive through area early.  Pharmacist Richard also does not know how to fill prescriptions as “ordered” by physician. Incompetent and poor customer service skills.

name: Ineke' Allen
text: The cashier was very welcoming

name: Jerry Hinton
text: I got there 30 minutes before closing and the doors were locked.....employee said they were closed.......😕

name: rashan lacy
text: I had to wait three hours on the prescription and it’s 730 now and it is still not ready never again

name: Yolanda Lewis
text: Quality customer service!

name: Oree Tanking
text: Basic CVS with snacks, make up aisle, pharmacy in the back etc.

name: Don Mabry
text: Not open as stated.  Tried to go here at 12:05 08/01/2021 and doors locked, no one there.  Walgreens really let me down when this location indicated online as being open 24hrs.  Whatever.  Went to CVS, and will only go CVS forward.

name: Jade Skye
text: There was an entire rack of items advertised on sale and they wouldn't honor the price. They wouldn't give me the price it was marked at. Shalia wouldn't even go back there and look. I didn't have time to argue so I just decided from now on I'll go across the street to CVS. Enjoy this 1 star review to go along with all the other 1 star reviews.

name: Destini R
text: I went in yesterday to get my passport picture taken. I was told to leave my number so they could give me a call when it was ready because there were a few orders ahead of me, so I did. I decided to wait around town because I thought surely it wouldn’t take over two hours, I was wrong. I never even got a call. I went back today to tell them I wanted to pick up my picture, because surely it was done and printed. When she asked for my name, she couldn’t find my picture? I told her I took it yesterday and was told I’d get a call when it was ready and didn’t think it would take 24hrs. She had to find my picture herself on the camera and print it out because the other woman did not do it. No wonder I didn’t recieve a call... It wasn’t even being printed.

name: Gin Lee
text:
24/ 7. Hours.
Great local pharmacy.

name: Dillon Montgomery
text: Not one person in the pharmacy in a mask. Yall got medical degrees please just use them for once. 3 people and every nose exsposed

name: Sara Hiatt
text: This is the worst pharmacy I've ever been to. I had to wait an hour for both doses of the COVID-19 vaccine. I had an appointment both times.

name: Victoria Ellis
text: Fast friendly service

name: Karson
text: I always have a good experience with the pharmacy at this location

name: Mona
text: Called pharmacy and they were so rude. Not helpful at all.

name: Jones Fowler
text: Not open 24 hours as clearly stated .

name: Kim Milligan
text: I went to pick up a prescription and did not have the information I needed. Shanetra Quarles helped me get the information I needed so that I could leave with my prescription. I quit going to Walgreens 2 years ago because of the lack of help from the employees. I will go back to Walgreens because of Shanetra.

name: Dale Burnett
text: The pharmasist were professional but some of the attendants are rude and not helpful and clearly do not appreciate their job. Sometimes we dont appreciate the water untill the well runs dry. If you sincerly enjoy and care for people it shows. And when you dont care it shows even more. I hope whatevers going on with these down and out individuals, it will come to pass for everyones sake. Thanks, Your friend Ms. Dale

name: chelsea mackey
text: Pharmacy techs are absolutely RUDE!

name: Carol Shaw
text: Wait only around 30 seconds for someone to answer the phone. They were very courteous and answered my questions quickly. I always get my prescriptions filled here with no issues. This was in the middle of the day and not at off hours.

name: Diana Parker
text: Worst pharmacy I’ve ever been to. After waiting over an hour on a prescription with my sick child I was then told they were out of the specific medication I needed. I asked them when I gave them the prescription and they said it would be ready shortly. Then when I questioned why they didn’t tell me when I brought it in that they were out I was threatened by the manager of the store. I would never go back there again. I will drive out of my way before going back there.

name: Chris Cobb
text: The customer service at this location has ALWAYS been awesome. The name of cashier isn't on the receipt, that I saw, but he always is very curteous and very helpful. Everything and everyone has an off day but I've never been disappointed here.

name: michael d mcgee
text: THEY WON'T EVEN ANSWER THE PHONE!

name: Brandi L Boyd
text: Slowest pharmacy ever!! Only plus is it's 24 hours!! I take a substantial amount of meds so there are times I need after regular pharmacies close...so they're my last resort

name: Samuel Stockman
text: Long wait for simple order. Pickup was at 2, wasnt ready until after 230 after we asked they started to fill it

name: Eric Pilkinton
text:
Pharmacy doesn't pick up the phone. Customer service is lacking. Won't be using this location again.

.... A week later I tried going through the drive-thru and after 15 minutes one car has not moved from the window. Another 5 minutes and I decide to leave after watching three other cars pull off. Absolutely horrible. Wouldn't even answer their phone when I tried to call to find out what was going on. Changing Pharmacy. Done with this place.

name: Andrew Marut
text: This place is the absolute worst pharmacy I have ever been to. They want you as the patient to do their job, when they should be taking care of sick people, not making more issues. Pick up the phone and call the doctor if things are not in order, don’t call the sick patient and expect them to call. YOU ARE THE PHARMACIST, YOU DO YOUR JOB 😡

name: Alyssa Bush
text: Ive only used this pharmacy since I moved to Northport and honestly I've never had a problem with them. I see a lot of negative reviews for this walgreens but maybe theyve had a change of staff since most of those were posted. As for the cashiers and other staff members, they're also great! They've never failed to impress me.

name: Amanda
text: Had a bad experience with a passport photo. They took forever taking the photo due to the camera dying and not having enough memory. The staff kept having to take my young child's photo because of the camera and took about 6 picture before it got right.  Took about 45 minutes. Submitted the photo with our application but it was denied due to the size of the head being too large. So we had to retake the photo at walgreens again and PRAY we get our passport in time for a very expensive trip. If we do not we will have to expedite new paperwork and this will all be due to walgreens not resizing the photo correctly. We asked for a refund which they would not give. The staff was as helpful as the could be on the first visit and I do not blame them for the equipment failure. But i believe due to their error we should have been offered a new photo and refund.

name: Voodoo Actual
text: I waited about 25 minutes to drop off a prescription. That's right - just to drop it off. When I finally got to the counter I was told they couldn't take any more prescriptions since they were so busy. I let the young lady know that I was just dropping it off for later when suddenly a sweaty behemoth of a pharmacist appeared. He informed me that he was to busy and he wouldn't fill it later either. I was further told that I should go somewhere else. No problem. This was my first and last experience with Walgreens - never spent a dime and never will. They should be required to pay me for my time though.

name: Julie Woosley
text: Most of the workers are nice, but there is always a long line at the pharmacy. Waited about 30 minutes tonight to pick up some medicine.

name: Sarah Cheshire
text: Considering how your pharmacy made millions monopolizing all the AL blue cross plans this year, one would think you would be able to invest more in customer service. I've spent 2 hours on hold today and each time I call a different assistant answers and can't seem to track down my prescription. Have called my doc multiple times to confirm that it is there. Am now on hold for the third time today an my doctors office is about to close and I'm starting to experience side effects from not being able to get my meds. This is not the first time this has happened. Shame on Walgreens for taking state ACA $ but not using it to provide decent care.

name: Mastershy 771
text: It took 4 hours to get my meds filled! Go to Jann's Pharmacy! They are great!

name: Paul Sturdivant
text: Pharmacy always very busy and today is the busiest I have ever seen it. This raises a question, is their service that bad or maybe their prices are that good  ?  You decide !!

name: JERRY LOUIE
text: Longest wait ever in pharmacy drive thru. Was dropping off Mother inlaw prescription. About 48 minutes.

name: Brittany Turner
text: Probably the worst pharmacy in Tuscaloosa. The pharmacist on staff seems to always be rude. Just not worth the trouble

name: Steven Galvez
text: Used pharmacy service..was quick

name: J. Morgan Curl
text: Went to pickup a Western, at the signing point, the signing pinpad malfunctioned and waited 30 minutes for it to come up.  Employees were polite, but equipment issues will keep me from EVER using Walgreens for Western Union again.

name: Parker Files
text:
EMBARASSING for a pharmacy to be this lackadaisical about keeping things from being expired!! I won't be coming back.

Got some pain meds for my kidney stone. Figured what the heck Ill get a pepsi. NBD right? Wrong. Flat as a blade.
Returned it.
Got a coke. Even worse.
Returned it.
Went around the store and I cant find ANY cokes that arent expired and pepsis that are only good to like november and January in a few rare cases. Are their inventory people in a coma? Did they die? Get your meds here but dont shop here.

name: Krystal Cameron
text: Workers are very helpful and seem to enjoy and take pride with their jobs!

name: MakeupForMermaids 2019
text: The store itself is great but the pharmacy is terrible!

name: J Cobb
text: Nice cashier, good sales with your rewards card.

name: Anna Martin
text: This pharmacy is TERRIBLE!! Twice now they've told me to wait 15 min while they get my prescription ready and I ended up waiting AN HOUR AND A HALF this is completely unacceptable. Every time I go to pick up my prescription they give me the generic of my brand when I specifically tell them that I want the brand and to never assume to give me the generic. Today I have called 5 times, my call has never been answered despite being on hold 15 min each time I call. I am switching all of my prescriptions to CVS. I'm done wasting my time and money, Walgreens has forever lost my service at every location.

name: Morgan Denson
text: This is the slowest pharmacy I've ever been to. This is partially due to their volume but is made worse by the techs working at a snails pace. They usually have to search and search for my already prepared prescription. After a year, I am moving my prescriptions because it is the same experience each time.

name: K Holbrook
text: TERRIBLE! Dropped my prescriptions off 24 hours ago and told the pharmacy tech, I would pick them up the next morning. My husband goes to pick them up 24 hours later AND THE PRESCRIPTIONS ARE STILL NOT FILLED!!!! THIS IS VERY FRUSTRATED AND NOT VERY CUSTOMERS FRIENDLY!!!

name: Nathan Parker
text: Inability to communicate between doctors and patients mean your prescriptions take forever to fill. Slow drive thru.

name: Sam Key
text: Drive thru is slow. They told us our scripts were ready so we drove all the way out here, and then they told us they weren't ready. I am livid! Will be taking my business elswhere.

name: Veronica Jones
text:
Take to long to get medication, also bad about not giving you the brand name of products that you want.

When calling they put you in hold for long period of time.

name: Regan Hardy
text: Come on, pharmacy people. You have to pick up the phone.

name: Margy McCarthy
text: The pharmacists are extremely rude as well as slow. Waited for almost an hour and a half

name: cassidy edwards
text: Horrible service!! Never quick, always a long wait. I literally heard one of the techs talking about a customer who was in the drive thru. I will be moving my prescriptions asap.

name: Grayson Menard
text: This is the worst pharmacy in the area.

name: Elliott Thomas
text: Great

name: Aimee Barnes
text: They seriously need to hire more people, on hold for over an hour on the phone, waiting in drive thru for 30 minutes with no other cars. If they had more people working they might be ok but we are moving all of our prescriptions.

name: Ronald Crouse
text: They don’t answer the phone at all I have my diabetic strips was on processing for 2 1/2 weeks they took them off Processing and told me they without stock they never do answer the phone I just had to call corporation and make a complaint sorry store the only one that’s good is that one pharmacy that works there I recommend Nobody do business with them no more Fixing to change pharmacies

name: Monique Houle
text:
Went there today, 25 minute drive each way.  Apparently they had Lysol disinfectant spray.  As it happened, the clerk asked if he could help. I said I am looking for the Lysol spray.  He then said this woman in front of me has just purchased the last 3.   Seriously? 3? All stores seems to have a 1 per household limit on these types of items.  The lady in question turned to me and acknowledged she has the 3 along with I don’t know how much hand sanitizer etc.   This was WRONG.

Store manager will be notified.

name: Errica Andrews
text: I've never had any issues with customer service but my GOODNESS the pharmacy service is soooo SLOW!!!! Don't go if you're in a hurry.

name: Theophaneia Love
text: Please complete your staff with people verses getting a new and unimproved phone system. That does not help your consumer but yet frustrates them, while trying to place orders over the phone just to go in the store and realize it's only two people working. So stand up to your name (C)onsumer (V)alue (S)tore because your not showing value to your consumers if your not showing value to your staff.

name: Jennifer Brown
text:
CONSIDER A DIFFERENT PHARMACY

So I'm currently on 3 calls with the same CVS to verify a prescription. The longest hold time is currently over 36 minutes. I'm going to leave it going until close to see if anyone ever answers.

Even walmart is better than this. Step your game up. I'll post a picture shortly.

UPDATE:
So after holding 1 hour 2 minutes (the middle call). Someone answered. Of course, the prescription wasn't ready "because a printer is down." This is standard practice for CVS in Center Point, which is why I was calling in advance. The guy on the line was so used to the lie it wasn't even sincere.

Asked when the prescription would be filled. He didn't know. Of course. Asked if I could have my prescription transferred to a different location. The guy said that I can, I just need to give my name and DOB.

1 hour hold times for calls if you need to speak to someone, and wait time for prescriptions are 20 to 45 minutes even if the prescription was sent 2 hours ago.

This isn't the first time, but it is my last using any CVS. Maybe they own Walgreens or have shares in Wal-mart or somewhere I can get better service.

name: kevin cason
text: The rudest staff i have ever seen. They followed me down every isle i assume to see if i was going to shoplift, needless to say, i dont shoplift, this happens every single time i go, so, i dont go anymore!

name: Braider4u Braider4u
text: It’s slow but they have positive vibes

name: Ben Perkins
text: Just your average CVS

name: derrill wilson
text: Excellent Service

name: Curtis Jackson Jr
text: No comment

name: Tony Canterberry
text: Flawless store! Perfectly organized, incredibly clean! Super cool, friendly staff! 5 stars!

name: Wendy Guillory
text:
I am writing this review to draw attention to a serious matter regarding the offensive behavior exhibited by Manager Beth. The incident occurred on the evening of 07/22/2021 at the Alabaster Alabama location. I frequently visit the Alabaster location, however Sales Manager Beth made my experience horrible. Due to the negative experience,  I will never visit that particular location.I’ve never been so disappointed with service.
I reported the horrible experience to customer service and I am hopeful that the problem will be corrected but I would like to make all shoppers aware. A shopping experience should be delightful and not confrontational.

Happy shopping!!

text: The store was extremely neat and organized.  All the staff was friendly. I got a ton of great products.

name: Jennifer Christian
text: Love that store, enjoy there bodywash , candles and there plug-ins 😀😍👍🏽💖👏💫

text: Went today for $2.95 sale. Store organized staff helpful. Just go early during sale days they were pretty wiped out but 2pm

name: Key S
text: Awesome as usual! Great products and superb customer service !👌

name: T
text:
I purchased items at a store and I forgot a coupon. I went back and brought the items to get the coupon added. The lady said one of the items was not on the receipt. That wasn’t my fault. So, instead of letting me keep the free item (THAT WASNT ADDED) she charge me for it and added my coupon towards it. I got annoyed and told her to just add charge me for the item and I’ll pay the difference with the coupon added. INSTEAD, she refunded everything and recharge me again for the full price. I check my balance and it still show I’m currently charge for two amounts. I did get a refund. I’ll wait 3-5 days but if I don’t get my money back. We got a problem.

Instead of getting a free bonus air freshener. I got charge extra for something that wasn’t added and lost a free item. I WAS BASICALLY BETTER NOT RETURNING BACK TO THE STORE.

name: Tameka Perdue
text: I love it employees are very nice & helpful.

name: Sydney Getz
text: They’re always so nice and helpful! Love this store and will always recommend to anyone looking for a bath and Body in the area. Sometimes the policies and coupons can be confusing but this staff is always so patient and understanding. Couldn’t say enough nice things about them.

name: Dorothy Guillory
text: I visited the Bath and Body's Location in Calara, The first thing I noticed was the face mask that the staff was wearing, Not only was they protecting themselves by wearing the face mask they were also protecting the customers.

name: ashley bee
text: Alabaster bath and body is ALWAYS a joy to shop! The ladies that work here are SUPER nice and helpful. I will always shop here

name: Lynn Williams
text: Love B&BW, but I hate that they never had a good online sale during the pandemic when people needed their products, not just wanted them. Shows they care only about money

name: AC
text: beautiful and organized store! everyone was friendly, patient, and helpful. shannon was really kind and helped us out so much! will definitely be coming back to this location.

name: Jessica Black
text: We really enjoyed our experience here. The store is clean, organized and pleasantly fragranced. An employee named Jordan was not only helpful, but very personable and such a joy to talk with. She was very interactive with us and my little girl even while she was working hard, which made us feel at home. She needs a promotion for her dedication and warmheartedness! I have absolutely no complaints here!

name: Liz C.
text: Went two days ago because I ran out of hand sanitizer and wanted more soap. There's really helpful arrows so all shoppers kept good distance, the sales team was very cheerful - I think they like their work. They talked me into a new scent for beside the kitchen sink! I will be back!!!!

name: Mary Costlow
text: Great sale going on today in store.  Greeted at door with a shopping bag and cheerful sales associate.  Store has just reopened and they were starting to get busy.  Well stocked and ready for shoppers.

name: Bryan Hensley
text: Jordan was absolutely delightful! The store was clean, organized and had a huge selection. I DEFINITELY recommend!

text: Never have a problem when I go. I’m there every week just about, and I always receive outstanding customer service.

name: Christina Chamblee
text: Love the service and kindness

name: Monique Moore
text: I was very excited when I found out there would be a Bath and Body Works in my area. I went once before with no problem. I went tonight and there were 2 customers there me another lady. I stood in line for a very long time while the lady in front of me was being assisted. Once it was my turn I asked the sales associate behind the counter if they only had 1 register open? When she tried to respond the manager comes over and was very rude and said yes there are no customers here so we just have one and walked away. I advised her that she was very rude and left the items there. The manager at this store needs more customer service training, you had more employees working than customers but I still waiting a lengthy time to be helped and she laughed like she didn't care. I will be reporting this to corporate.

name: Veronica Ramos
text: I went in yesterday and let me just say. There was a employee there who didn’t know what she was doing. On Bath and Body Works webiste it advertised a sale in store and online for any select lotions for $3.95. I grabbed my Japanese Cherry blossom body cream and went to go check out. It rung up at $13.00. I politely asked why didn’t it pop up at $3.95. She said what do you mean? I showed her the page and said there’s a sale going on. She proceeded to say “I need to see a barcode to scan” Clearly there was no bar code but she proceeded to roll her eyes and scan a peice of paper to give the discount. Other than that. I had a good experience.

text: They have the best customer service

text:
Does anybody know the name of the Pharmacy Manager and how to contact them?
Update-this was/is the store on Love Ave, in Tifton, GA.
Must admit…a person from the store did call me to resolve my problem. But the name of the manager remains a mystery to me…

name: Angela Campbell
text: Just meet someone there didn't go inside

name: Angie Brabham
text: Great photo quality on prints, but do your photo selection online. Usually only one kiosk is working and it's slow. Worst experience I've had with them was today with an employee adamant that my online order was not there. He did not want to listen to me explain how this was the 2nd time an online special order had been sent there by corporate and all I had to do was pick it up. He was so persistent that I was wrong and he was right. Finally he found my order, but didn't apologize for misunderstanding, but said, "Corporate did this, not us." Okay, what does that matter to me? I showed him the confirmation email that it had been paid for but he still did not believe me and got a manager. Finally the manager showed him that it was sent here, paid for, for me to pick up. Might as well paid shipping to my house for that customer service, or lack there of!

name: Amber Williams
text: Very quick and friendly!

name: Dominique Lee
text: Very helpful staff.

name: Anthony Melton
text: Super service.

name: jonah flowers
text: Horrible Customer Service, Never Have My Prescriptions Ready Or In Stock, And Had A Nasty Attitude After Been On Hold For 15mins

name: Jubilee Dueck
text: This place doesn't even deserve a one-star. One of the technicians here stole half of my prescriptions. Now, I'm from out of town and this was my first and last time using this Walgreens. I went on a Thursday evening, and dropped off my prescriptions, then I went out to dinner. Afterwards I came back to Walgreens, there was a brunette at the register who was rude. I thought, she must be tired because she didn't look too good. I paid for my medication and walked out of the pharmacy. I went back to my place and noticed half the prescription was missing! I thought that's strange half my medication is missing and I just left the pharmacy that's never happened before, so I assumed it was probably a mistake.  When I finally got in contact with the pharmacy, I explained what happened and a woman responded saying she needed to check their records. After a few seconds she comes back on the line to tell me their counts for the prescriptions were accurate and she couldn't do anything about it. I said, I will come up there with the prescription bottles to discuss this! Then she proceeds to tell me she's the Pharmacy's Manager. At this point, I was getting upset! I told her this pharmacy charged me FULL price for a months supply of prescriptions then only gave me half of it. I told her, I had to pay out of pocket for this and I want to be reimbursed.  She continued to say there's nothing she could do.  Well, that's just too bad, because for a "Manager" not to even attempt to investigate  problems when a customer is genuinely upset and telling the truth about a bad experience just baffles me. Why isn't this manager more concerned that a technician took someone elses medicine from the pharmacy's safe and then falsifed records to get away with it?! She's kept saying there's nothing she could do. Really?! Why don't you fire the employee, so this doesn't happen again. Stealing medicine is illegal, but it's ok I know EXACTLY what to do and I will be making a police report about that employee and this Pharmacy.

name: Fred Shiels
text: I gave one star because they didn’t have an option for Zero!!!  These people at the Carter Hill store are the most RUDE, unprofessional “employees” I have ever encountered anywhere. I fail to see how any of them keep a job. Today will most definitely be my last visit to this Walgreens. I guess I should say shame on me... cause I gave them a second chance too. There won’t be a third.

name: Chava Jancaterino
text: I get great service here. The employees are always friendly and helpful.

name: Charge Barge
text: My experience sucked.  They apparently lost my first prescription on a controlled substance.  The pharmacist thought I was lying at first, assuming I was out for drugs.  Then realized that I got a notification from them that my prescription was delayed for the prescription prior to stopping by to pick it up.  They then apologized without giving me my medications.  It was out of their hands, so, I figured, no big deal.  I sent in the second one without a problem.  Today, I returned and I found out they're waiting for a prior authorization for the second medication.  The first one in the morning called my doctor's office and told them to disregard the first prior auth, and then the second pharmacist (Brittni H.) in the afternoon was still waiting for the prior auth that the first one was supposed to send.  Now, prior authorizations take a while to process, so they sadly just wasted a whole day of lack of processing, much to the chagrin of both me and my physician's staff (since we were both given the runaround).  I should really sue the pants off the pharmacists involved in these shenanigans here.

name: Tyler Moran (TylerT)
text: Ordered some pictures online and were able to pick them up the same day.

name: Sarah Spratling
text: Good drug store with knowledgeable clerckd

name: Bella Aaron
text: That star rating is actually a negative number one! Worst Walgreen's ever. I gave them a second chance and learned a second time not to go here. They have never had any of my prescriptions in stock EVER! What good is a pharmacy that when you get out of a hospital and need it they tell you they can have it in a couple of days? Especially if your life depends on it. Worst part is, they don't call and tell you so you do t have to be inconvenienced by driving there for nothing when you are ill. Go across the street to CVS. They care about their customers and are very friendly. Shame on you Walgreen's!

They make joe biden look like a freaking genius..

I couldn’t be more appreciative, especially when most would have made me pay full price. Thank you for the help!!! I will definitely bring all of my monthly prescriptions here.

Service is non existent, wait times are abysmal, you may receive the correct medication (or not like me), and you will be treated rudely when you complain about receiving the wrong prescription. Only a fool would trust their life with these people.

I use this pharmacy all the time I dropped prescription off at noon to pick up at 5. You filled it for patient with my dob that lives in Florida.
And now I sit behind everyone, because you did not double check address that was on prescription at or question why you were filling prescription for Florida address.

text: The NORTHPORT location is often later than 9:00 opening their doors. Sometimes for "computer issues" and other times for no reason at all. The management has really gone downhill over the last year or so!!

name: Eddie Cheshire
text: I had an issue with the pharmacy not having my prescription ready. Prescription was faxed from doctor office Tuesday, it's Friday and still ain't ready. I called the store and talked to the store manager Craig, of whom which was awesome in helping me. He talked to the pharmacist and fixed the problem. Craig was extremely helpful, he will even call you back when he says he will. Craig is a valuable CVS manager and his customer service gets 5 stars from me, the pharmacy gets zero stars.

name: Jessica Rogers
text:
This is the most nonprofessional CVS . If a person was on there death bed they would literally die if this CVS has to refill they medicine. They should just SHUT COMPLETELY DOWN and not be able to re open . My son DOCTOR called in a prescription for him 3 weeks ago and this CVS yet hasn’t gotten it . Also , they like to play on the phone I’ve been holding on the line for 30 minutes, no one yet hasn’t picked up the phone (every so often it seems like they pick up the phone and then put it back down). PATHETIC
CVS pharmacy staff has to do better !!

name: Scott Harris
text: I dropped my prescription off at 9 a.m . I was told during the drop off that it would be ready at lunch. I arrived to pick up my prescription at 3:45 p.m. and was informed that it wouldn’t be ready until 5 p.m. I then explained to the pharmacy assistant that I was told it would be ready at lunch in which she practically called me a liar and told me that I didn’t drop it off at 9. Completely unacceptable customer service. That is the most convenient place to fill my prescription due to it being close to where I work but I will never use this pharmacy again.

name: Melissa Edgil
text: I went to the CVS,across from WalGreens and by the Waffle  and Hardees, this morning to pick up my daughters prescription. A costumer shouldnt b made to feel aweful and b rude to by the pharmacist  aide or whatever. This particular  cashier/attendant pratically threw the bag at me rather than placing the bag in the basket and politely sliding it to me. If u dont want to b at work dont go into work however if u do go in to work treat ur damb customers as u want to b treated. Dont b short and hateful to ur customers.

name: Krystal Davis
text: We had to change to CVS when my husband’s insurance changed. This pharmacy is awful in all areas-customer service, answering the phone & questions, and actually having medications and filling prescriptions. We had to go several days with out a very necessary medication. They kept promising they were “working on it”. It is not an unusual Medicine and definitely not one we could go without. We ended up having to go back to our old pharmacy and pay out of pocket price for a 7 day supply. It has been 4 days and we still don’t have his medicine from CVS. I will be finding another pharmacy ASAP.

name: Jase Boswell
text: The pharmacy never has it's stuff together. I have literally been waiting a week for my prescription and they're telling me they're two weeks behind that they'll put me in line. This is just ridiculous I will definitely be changing pharmacies.

name: Laura Bazemore
text: They keep u on hold for so long I’ve been on hold for 55 minutes and when I get thru they are so rude and short with you. In the pharmacy they don’t make eye contact just very unprofessional.

name: Kristen Miller
text: One star is being generous. CVS promises my medications will be ready and then never has them filled on time. The drive thru is always closed, there are long lines, and they are under staffed and rude. One clerk is always particularly rude, and seems to not want to do her job of filling my medication that was promised 6 hours ago. Wish I could take my business elsewhere but my insurance prefers CVS, believe me as soon as I can I will. No one would ever choose to use this pharmacy as their preferred!!

name: Shayna German-Carter
text: I went into the store to purchase an item and had a question. The store manager, Scott, was very rude and disrespectful to the point where he walked away from me while I was asking him my question. I went to the counter to finish asking him and his reply to me was, "I'm the store manager and I have been here 5 years and I do what I want." I informed him that I would take my money and business elsewhere and I'd be calling corporate he stated, "Good, I don't care."

name: TIMOTHY ROACH
text: Don't answer phone. Has annoying music. And, they didn't have prescriptions ready when they say they would have them ready. Customer service sucks. If it was the fact that our insurance (work) want accept any other pharmacy, I would be saying see ya.

name: Sara Freeman
text: The pharmacist was very rude. Then when i tried to call in my refill the left me on hold..

name: Sabrena Brannon
text: I have maintenance drugs I take and the staff in the pharmacy are always so friendly and nice.

name: Paul Peacock III
text: Taking longer and longer to fill prescriptions. Gonna change to Walgreens and see what happens. Waited 20 minutes on the phone to see if my prescription was filled since they could not fill it yesterday. I finally hung up.

name: Scott Bussey
text: Awful and slow. They also lost my wife's prescription.

text:
Condescending and disrespectful. Incompetent pharmacy staff. The customer is treated as cattle only to be milked of his or her money. The only help they offer is saying " yes insurance pays or no your insurance doesn't pay."
Forget consultations, no time for that.

text: Very friendly, Employee nice, Very clean store

name: Peach Ciroc
text: My son was Racially Profiled by Donna 1/12/19 when I spoke to her she didn’t deny it . That didn’t sit well so I will be taking action..So CVS This is a shame we are in 2019 and we as African Americans can’t walk in a store without being judge 😡!!! To judge without firsthand knowledge and understanding (or precise knowing) is not discernment but Prejudice!!! CVS RACIALLY PROFILES!!!⁉️

name: Michael “Britt” Powell
text: They are closed most of the time. Ive tried to go in at 8:30 on a weeknight and 7:30pm on a Sunday. They're never open.

name: Chiquita Henderson
text: Short staffed, but very nice people. Whenever, I have to travel an hour away for my Dr. Appt and have a prescription to be filled they will make sure it is filled in a timely manner. Thanks for your efficient service! :-)

name: cocababy59 Alma Delia Marcial Nava
text: This is the cvs where Kimberly Arrington disappeared from almost 21 years ago on 10/30/1998. It's a shame this cvs didn't have servaliance or nothing like that I wonder what happened to her if she made it inside or if any employees remember seeing the then 16 year old girl.

name: Bonnie Turner
text: Excellent service and the store was well stocked and very clean.

name: jason kitchens
text: Very nice staff. They are helpful and are always Busy, no slackers here.

name: Debra Norton
text: Poor customer service and understaffed, I have been a customer for 12 years. I transferred my prescriptions to another company last week. People wake up..... CVS is not the only store in town. Upper management needs to fix this problem before you loose another long time customer.

name: Jessica Brazell
text: Their workers have very bad attitudes toward customers

name: Carl Bechtol
text: Neighborhood drug store.

name: héctor romero
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service in Pharmacy, the staff is very professional and friendly. I congratulate and highly recommend them. Vaccination is perfect and safe. They are the best.

(Original)
Excelente servicio en Farmacia, el personal es muy profesional y amable. Los felicito y recomiendo totalmente. La vacunación es perfecta y con total seguridad. Son las mejores.

name: Shawn Hunt
text: This CVS although it was super hot on the inside of the store was great about how they handled both of my Vaccine shots. The staff did a great job and had someone up front to book and set the appointments and even help new people book appointments as well. Good job to CVS on how they have handled Covid as well. I barely had to wait before getting the shot.

name: Troy Leslie
text: My wife and I had an amazing experience at the CVS. Wendy and Mackenzie went above and beyond providing good quality Care.

name: Nicole Davis
text: Pharmacy is unprofessional! They take forever to answer the phone and they do not have good customer service skills.

name: Jay Jordan
text: I don’t know about their actual pharmacy, but if I need something quickly while I’m on this side of town, this is my go to.

name: Steve Smith
text: Will not answer the telephone; changing pharmacies…

name: Jessica Tinsley
text: I’m not one to leave reviews often but I’m doing this to bring it to the attention of the staff here. I dropped off my prescription at 7:15 and she was so sweet and said they would be able to get to it before closing so I told her I would wait over on the side. She very sweetly made sure i was signed up to be notified via text. 30 minutes later I got a call they needed my Insurance Info. I went back to the window and they said they actually didnt and I asked her how long it would be and she said 15 to 20 minutes because they are 3 hours behind. I told her I would wait since I had already been waiting 30 minutes. She apologized and said OK and then 35 minutes later I was still waiting. I ended up leaving because I had my two-year-old with me who needed to get in the bed and will have to make a special trip back bar. I am now home and still haven’t been notified it’s ready which means it’s now been 40 minutes (on top of the 30 before they called me for insurance) since she told me 15-20. I feel that if someone is waiting in your parking lot, there would be some more urgency or a suggestion that i should plan to come back. There was no one else in the drive-thru and the parking lot was empty, so I am certain I was one of the only ones waiting on a prescription. This is just super poor customer service.

name: Vikki Nolen
text: CVS is the worst. I rated 1star because there was not a 0 star option. They provide no customer service they make errors in filling prescriptions and say theyll fix it but they wont instead they will stall until you prescription runs out and refuse to fill your rx for diabetic and/or heart medications. I cant see how they stay in business. If my insurance provided any other option i would gladly use it.

name: Claressa Fells
text:
I went to get a prescription filled yesterday waited 15 minutes while the entire pharmacy staff entertained a I'm assuming regular customer who cursed every other word. After standing in the pick up line  only one in line unacknowleege for 15 minutes I was told my prescription wasn't quite ready although it had been called in 3hrs prior. Showed up this morning at 8 so did 3 other customers who read online that the pharmacy opened at 8 to be told by the RIDEST young lady  that Google has it wrong and we should check better. This entire location is horrible
I will be taking my business elsewhere.

name: Jackson Harrison
text: Excellent/consistent customer service!! Keep up the great work!!

name: Tina Taylor
text: FYI:  The FB reviews are 3 out of 5.  Jaime, the pharmacist, is the RUDEST, most UNPROFESSIONAL person I've ever met.  I have filed a formal complaint with CVS corporate.  Last month, she had the nerve to tell me how incompetent and stupid the Walmart pharmacy was and yelled at their staff.  Not to mention, she was rude to me, as well.  Today, she was EXTREMELY rude to me again.  Enough is enough.  After being a CVS customer since the late 80s or early 90s, all my prescriptions, including my son's and parent's prescriptions, are now transferred to Walmart.  I will never visit CVS again.  Great job, Jaime.  What a mean and rude person you are!!!  Hopefully, someone will start checking your reviews, watching store videos, and monitoring your phone calls.  You shouldn't even have your job.  You're a disgrace!

name: Anthony Pineda
text: So I went to the Gadsden location today. I went to buy cookies. After browsing aisles I went to checkout. After buying my cookies I decided to buy a Hot wheels car. After I paid I went to get the car. After grabbing the car I realized that the cashier followed me. I think she thinks that I was going to shoplift. I don't know if the cashiers are required to follow customer to prevent stealing. (Happened on 1/28/2021)

name: JD G
text: Have been satisfied for most part. Do wish that help would be available in beauty department. Have left with out what I went for when I could not locate it myself. The pharmacy has taken some hard hits in the reviews here. Never experienced poor service and was very grateful for the service of administering flu shots in store.

name: S Wyatt
text: Fast, friendly service and prices are competitive.  Lots of items from home health to snacks and beauty supplies. Fantastic selection of skin care products for all types but I especially appreciate the array of options for sensitive skin and diabetic skin products. Service with a smile and never a problem returning an item that isn't amenable to my needs as long as I have the receipt.

name: fred b
text: If I could give zero stars I would! This pharmacy lacks in basic customer service, very rude employees in the pharmacy. When I wanted to transfer to another pharmacy and the new pharmacy called them, they told the new pharmacy we had nothing to transfer and no refills. Very next week I got notified by Walgreens that my refills were ready. When I called today to let them know I was transferring to Publix pharmacy the girl was argumentative and hung up on me. We will never grace the door of another Walgreens and we will tell everyone we know! Terrible experiences there! Also they discourage use of the GoodRX card for those that are uninsured!

name: Laura Franklin
text: Slowest pharmacy I’ve ever been to. Not just once, but EVERY TIME. Pharmacist are more interested in talking to each other, laughing it up. PITIFUL SERVICE!!!! Changed mine and my husbands to CVS. They are fast and friendly. Strictly business there.

name: Rachel Baugh
text: Highest prices in town, refuse to take GoodRX card for those without insurance,  very rude pharmacy workers. Will never go to another Walgreens!

name: Donyell “Dboy” Owens
text: No might favorite places

name: Jacquelan Bullock
text: Was having issues picking up funds and they didn't even care too help me. Went right too winn dixie amd picked up my funds with no issues. I will never step foot in this walgreens again.

name: Tabatha Vaughn
text: Pharmacy is usually very quick, with the exception of flu season when everyone is trying to get prescriptions filled. Staff is friendly and facility is always clean. They also usually have good sales on everyday items.

name: RENEE RIPP-CLONTS
text: I have been here numerous times the least time was 2 hrs for prescription pick up. My neighbor has to get a a better or quicker pharmacy. This place sucks.

name: Jess Evans
text: this is not a "fill while you wait" pharmacy. you drop it off, you come back later, simple. or else you will be disappointed. end of subject-period. PS pharmacy hours are not the same as store hours

name: Allen Rhodes
text: Linda the pharmacist has helped my daughter more than her pediatrician. Over the weekend we dealt with a sick child and eventually ended up in the ER . However Linda helped me every step of the way with my daughter taking time to explain things and she just showed a genuine concern for my daughter .I can't recommend her enough .

name: Becca Norwood
text: I never had a problem except at the 5:00 rush when people are all trying to get home from work so it's real busy, or on the holiday weekends... We just drop off & go to Walmart. I just had to transfer over to CVS because in Piedmont there is no Walgreens. I still shop here when I can get to Gadsden for a day trip. Great store! Good sales! Nice folks.👍💫

name: Doris Lowery
text: We have always been treated nicely at the store, but we will no longer be shopping there if the policy that we heard has been implemented, that men or women can use each others bathroom, we will not be buying or coming into your store.

name: Barbara Phillips
text: Call you when your medicine is ready have good sales workers are very helpful and friendly nice atmosphere very very clean things are exactly where they tell you where to find them everything is just so in order.

name: Wendy Uhlman
text: The employees are sometimes very nice and friendly....It's heck to get out of there parking lot on to Meighan Blvd...

name: Kevin Wells
text: I've been using them since Justinwas the pharmacist and the staff is very courteous and never judgemental.

name: Malika Wiley
text: Every time I come here there is only 2 people working in the pharmacy and the drive thru is ridiculous no one should be allowed to drop off and wait in the drive thru line 1hr in a drive thru that's crazy......only at Walgreens.. Go to McDonald's I bet you can't hold up there drive thru..smh

name: Brodys mx !
text: Very very rude and don't care about you. Stay away.

name: J Rogers
text: The pharmacy said that it would take about an hour that would have been at 1130 here it is 1335 an I'm still waiting for them to fill my medicine THIS is the least time I will ever give them my business.

name: Carol Payne
text: Friendly and helpful

name: Masina Overstreet
text: Love to shop here

name: April Ford
text: Went to pick up a prescription around 9pm on a Saturday night and they were closed even though they say  they are open til 10pm

name: jimmy nix
text: Can't seem to do their job mass confusion SLOW 🐢🐢🐢

name: Timothy Richey
text: It's impossible to get out of this place

name: Misty Brown
text: Pharmacy is slow!

name: Chris Newbern
text: Wonderful people working there, they always give me the best prices on my prescriptions

name: Adam Allsup
text: Called the pharmacy today to check on a prescription, as I usually do when they’ve been dropped off by doctors  over a week ago and wanted to know if they’d be open on Monday. The person started off nice and said yes, so I ask if my medication could be ready by 8am as that’s the usual time they open. “Literally do this EVERY MONTH” he tells me no, I said that’s how I usually do this he says “it’s not up for debate SIR” (Apparently, the pharmacy doesn’t open till 10 on holidays) (that may have been nice information to have been given, rather than being told “it’s not up for debate SIR!” I was absolutely stunned, as I had been extremely nice the whole time. He went on to lecture me so I just hung up on him. This will be the LAST time you speak to me like I’m a child. I will be sharing this story with all of my Cherokee county seniors and friends.

name: Jon Greenwood
text: Great location! Very disappointed that BCBS Alabama doesn't cover CVS anymore! ;(

name: stacy steele
text: Great place.

name: American Auctioneers
text: We love our local CVS. They know us by name and the staff are always friendly and helpful!!

name: Tom Mclemore
text: Always clean and organized. Everytime I have asked questions from the pharmacist, they have always answered my questions or come from behind the counter to help with questions about product. CVS card also offers huge savings.

name: Kenny Smith Sr
text: Nice people, long waits sometimes, but get things right and they answer all your questions.

name: Glenn Huggins
text: We’ve used Johnsons Pharmacy in Cedar Bluff since we moved here 9 years ago, but my company uses CVS Caremark for medicines so the prices are cheaper here.   Just kinda funny getting charged 25 cents a piece for needles when we got them free at Johnsons.

name: Kevin Gowens
text: Close to home and convenient too my disabled family

name: Amanda King
text: Very clean,  best place for vitamins ! :)

name: Thori Brewer
text: Always helpful and friendly!

name: Britney Bailey
text: Very friendly staff and clean store.

name: ReXrig G R
text: Love Shopping Here

name: Mason Reed
text: Never went to the pharmacy but I have been several times just to pick up a few things. I love the store layout and friendliness of the cashiers. A great place to go to pick up over the counter meds, college supplies, or any other small items. Definitely saved me with them being open 24 hours when everywhere else is closed at night.

name: Leigh
text: Went to have a prescription filled a couple of weeks ago. Was told it was going to be about an hour or an hour and a half. Since it was days before qualifying exams for my masters program, I decided to try and wait it out instead driving to my house back, then back to cvs, and then back to my house, because I had my computer and could study. About an hour goes by, and all I hear from the other side of the cash registers is gossipy talk, complaining and conversations of “when did you get here?” “Oh, so we both get off at seven,” etc. I ended up getting sick of hearing it and bought a couple gaterades and asked the girl who had just clocked in and who was checking me out how much longer it would be. A girl, who had not helped me the first time but had just overheard the initial conversation, chimed in before she could inquire with them and said “an hour to an hour and a half at least”. I went home, living less than two miles from the cvs and right after I kicked off my shoes and got set up at my desk I received a message my prescription was ready. Less than 15 minutes later. Unprofessional and unhelpful due to the pettiness and disregard of customer service from pharmacy staff. Highly recommend going to the CVS on Glenn Avenue instead of this one. I’ve never had a problem with them, and pharmacy staff member Lee is my favorite. Always so kind, even when backed up with “17  prescription orders” to fill before my own, unlike south college.

name: Riley Hovis
text: The best service around. As a student I appreciate every bit of cash I can save here and there. I came in and was paying over $100 for my prescriptions and that did not sit right with their team of pharmacy staff. So, they took an extra couple of minutes of their shift to go over why I was paying so much and got by total down to $40. Now that is customer service!

name: Edward Dubuisson
text: The pharmacist , a wowan named Alex, just went above, and Beyond, by Not Quiting untill she could help me. I have been waiting 2 days on Walgreens, and CVS in Opelika.  Alex , at CVS on college street got it done in 5 minutes.  Great Job Alex, Thanks.

name: Harrison
text: Always am greeted when I arrive. Have prompt service and find the things I need.

name: Anya M
text: A cashier at the front completely invaded my space and spent a lot of time trying to open my grocery bag (even though I was at self checkout), then he ended up licking his fingers to open it. During the COVID pandemic especially, this made me feel extremely unsafe and disrespected.

name: Jan Carlock
text: Do not recommend the pharmacy.  They will ignore you when standing in line and go to other people just walking up.

name: Carolina Palencia Gándara
text: I had many troubles with a prepaid money card, I almost lost 300$, but the store manager was very patient and helped me for days until he got to refund me. I very much appreciate his help and kindness with my situation!

name: Garrett Jacobsen
text:
Great for quick grocery shopping. Friendly staff and quick checkout times. One of the self checkout machines tends to freeze up, though, so be careful.

Note: the pharmacy no longer accepts Tricare Standard insurance funded prescriptions.

name: Edel Lopez
text: Convenient, in my way out of the University, perfect to buy milk, cereal, even gifts from the University. Always with good deals and good wine! The young girls working here always have an smile for the clients and very helpful!

name: Matt M
text: Great store with friendly staff! They have many items to buy with convenience. Glad I have them nearby! Highly recommend!

name: Ciji Sabo
text: The cashier was so rude.  She refused to accept my coupons because she was not familiar with the store's coupon policy regarding coupon overages. (However, I should have not been in such a hurry and presented her with a copy of the policy in an effort to rectify the situation, thus the 3 star instead of 2 star rating.)  She seemed frustrated that I chose not to purchase my items when she wouldn't honor the coupons.  Store is clean and very nice, but the customer service was awful!

name: Abbye Rhodes
text: The guy who works at the pharmacy was an absolute jerk to me today. When people come in looking to fill a prescription, they are likely not feeling great, and to be met with rudeness is not fun. When I asked if he could do something simple for me he responded with, "I can, but I am not going to." I have honestly never felt more disrespected. A friend of mine had a similar experience with this employee. His name is Anton and I suggest that if you go to this CVS you avoid him at all cost.

name: Krystian Stern
text: cashier on friday night was really rude and sarcastic to me and i left feeling annoyed

name: Eli L
text: It’s a well run store, and the pharmacy staff are so nice! I get all my meds here and I haven’t been disappointed.

name: John Brenner
text: Inexcusably incompetent and rude.  Their point of sale software clearly has major issues and results in massive lines and multiple attempts needed to complete a transaction -- and this has been a problem for DAYS.  Their left register has this problem; when I asked the cashier to use another register, she lied and said that it wouldn't be open to use.  Sure enough, the manager came to the front and activated the register, and in a very snarky tone told me I "didn't need to be upset" when all I did was point out that their store had an ongoing technical issue.  I will be notifying corporate since clearly not even store management has an interest in being professional.  I was also not given a receipt; I've worked in retail and I know that the only conceivable reason a receipt wouldn't be given is so that the employee names wouldn't be disclosed, so whoever worked on the night of April 4, 2018 around 9:10 PM should be held accountable.

name: Kristina Harper-collins
text: Very convenient. I really like that it is open 24 hours.

name: Randy Farber
text: It's best attribute is convenience.  However, on two separate occasions, I have been bait and switched on posted sale prices, and had to go through a hassle to have the item removed and put back because they wouldn't honor the sale price posted on the shelf.

name: Matthew Bays
text: Nice store clerk everyone is always super nice!

name: wells jadee
text: Shopping here!

name: Walker Ranger
text: poor customer service

name: Yolanda Collins
text: There are certain beauty products that I buy here. I find Walgreens a bit pricey. This store is never crowded and always nice and clean.

name: Candy Bein
text: The pharmacy staff is terrible! Today, I finally had enough of the cashier, Penny, and spoke with a manager. Penny has been rude for the last 4 months. If you don't like your job, you shouldn't be there. You wouldn't have a job without customers. From now on, I will refuse service from Penny whenever she is there. I am almost tempted to change pharmacies completely. If it wasn't for the preauthorization on my husband's much needed heart medication, I would have already changed. I am sure even Wal-Mart Pharmacy treats their customers with more respect. I may even contact corporate if this pattern continues with Penny. The service is so bad that I remembered her name specifically to avoid her in the future.

name: Sam
text:
Today Mary the cashier told me to step back on the big blue dot in the floor at the checkout. I didn’t realize I was 1 yes I said 1 small step outside of the big blue dot. So she scolds me.
If they are going to be so corrective towards customers then tell the manager to pull her mask up off her chin and wear it properly.
The manager was walking around with her mask on her chin.

name: Fran Gaudsmith
text: Rude, condescending pharmacy staff. I am visiting; if I lived here this would be my last choice for a pharmacy.

name: Patsy Mickle
text: Always fast and courteous service. It’s a pleasure to shop here

name: Maurice Korshak
text: This is the best pharmacy and store.  They are always super friendly and polite.  They go the extra mile to make sure we were happy and have a clean well stocked store.

name: Shane Pitts
text: Cashier Connie very rude I just left went to CVS to buy my emergen c she had it on table by register but told you to step back when went to get it was to close if she feels that way maybe should not work around public won’t be back

name: sava gvero
text:
This Walgreen is the absolute best..
Especially the people in the pharmacy.
So professional and helpful !

name: Cory Smithson
text: Always a great experience fast. Helpful. And nice employees. Rona Goodwin is a great associate and has excellent knowledge of the store.

name: Abby Myrex
text: Always only have enough to partially fill insulin my husbands prescriptions. Unable  to answer questions or give explanations.

name: Joe and Angela Eustice
text: I had a few coupons and they matched what I bought . Anyhow the manger was a very unprofessional and said " Walgreens is getting strict on the coupon policy...  I'm not an extreme couponier I just wanted to use the coupons I clipped out of Sunday paper ... I left the store with nothing. And the sales rep Omg you can tell her and the manager didn't get along .  The worst Walgreens I ever been in .

name: Tommy Gunn
text: Easy return.  Friendly staff.  I like doing business here.

name: Zeta Smiles
text: I love this store and most of the staff is very friendly and willing to point you in the right direction.

name: Jerry Layton
text: Staff is very personable and professional.

name: Heather Layton
text: Some of the pharmacy staff are so rude! Has happened on more than 1 occasion.

name: Steven Vincent Knowles
text: I pooped!

name: Royal GemAndJewel
text: Wide variety of things as well as helpful staff

name: ISAAC ORTIZ
text: ALWAYS OPEN AND READY FOR US CUSTOMERS.  LUV THE LADIES THERE.   GREAT SELECTION FOR LOW PRICES.

name: Dawn Buttrum
text: The clerk stayed on the phone the whole time we were there. We had to ask for help more than once while she was talking on the phone ignoring us and other customers.

name: Manny Jackson
text: Bad customer service 😑 😒 🙄 😤

name: Stephanie Gray White
text: You can get good hair products at great prices here.

name: Catrina Russell
text: Needs a better variety of hair

name: Chad Dean
text: Love the wig selection!!

name: Falonda Harris
text: Not a large selection

name: Kevin Pate
text: This CVS location is always fast and awesome despite being the busiest CVS I’ve ever been to. It’s across the street from east Alabama medical center which makes it busier but this pharmacy team is great. Grace is the best. She’s always so helpful and if I were you I would always ask for her help if you need something specific. Thank you CVS on perperrel parkway!!! Thank you GRACE

name: Usicmike
text: This place is the worst location you could ever go to. Please don’t use this one . I thought I had to because of my insurance but I went to Walgreens and it was also accepted there and other places... CVS you need to evaluate your employees at this location...Rude and absolutely unprofessional!! I’m sure it wasn’t the pharmacist but it was definitely the male technician..

name: Chinyere Knight
text: The Staff Pharmacist is irresponsible and arrogant.

name: melissa weaver
text: The staff in the pharmacy is horrible. The guy smacking his gum while telling me they don’t have the med I was prescribed And offers no help trying to help me find another pharmacy. I have to use this pharmacy or I WOULD NOT!! CVS should be ashamed!!!

name: Brandon Teer
text:
One of the most professional and friendly businesses I’ve ever visited!

Danielle, the pharmacist, treated me with dignity and respect while saving more than 250+ dollars on my medication I’ve been paying way too much for from other pharmacies!

The store manger greeted me with more respect as I cashed out some Christmas gifts at the front register while going over and beyond with genuine kindness!

I had my prescription filled and my Christmas purchases paid for in less than 25 minutes!

Merry Christmas, CVS! 🎁

name: Elliott Wood
text: Initial staff was friendly and not a problem. He was willing to forward my question to the pharmacist and I understand her explaination of why she could not do what I was asking about, however there was no reason for her to immediately address me like I had just killed her dog. She was extremely rude without provocation. I won't be back at this pharmacy in the future.

name: Virginia Crawford
text: First time getting a prescription filled took my entire lunch hour, so I decided to drop my next prescription off and pick up after work. I dropped it off at 12 and was asked when I wanted to pick it up. I told her 4. I gave them an extra hour and arrived at 5 in the drive thru. I was told it wasn’t ready and to leave the drive thru line, drive around the building and get at the end of the line. If you can’t count 20 pills and put in a bottle within 5 hours you should close your doors. I will not be back, nor will I recommend anyone do business with your establishment.

name: Kjaye 27
text: People working at the pharmacy are completely unprofessional. Initial pharmacist I spoke with was unnecessarily rude with aggressive comments not needed or wanted. The other techs/pharmacists in the back were speaking rudely about other patients the entire time. Last time I will be picking up from here.

name: Brennan
text: After being discharged from the hospital my husband and I went to the drive through pharmacy to get my prescriptions filled. They informed us it would be an hour wait so we left. He dropped me off at home so I could rest and returned to pick up my prescriptions only to be told they didn’t even fill them yet because they won’t take my BCBS insurance. My husband drove back from Auburn for something they could have told us over the phone. He took my prescriptions to Walgreens where it only took them fifteen minutes to fill and my insurance was accepted. Not only are the workers at this location rude, but also incompetent. Will not be returning.

name: Herbert Alexander
text: I starting calling the pharmacy today at 5:30 today to speak to a technician about a prescription. My wife and I each called at least four times and no one ever took our calls. We were placed on auto hold each time for approximately 5 minutes each. Each time the call either ended due to what I think was an automatic timeout or we were disconnected.  The mangement needs to correct this subpar service.

name: Rylan Delap
text: Staff are negligent, rude and incompetent.  They are actively unhelpful and even understaffed.  This is not only the pharmacy but the store itself.  Ridiculous

name: Kris (With Kris)
text: Great service and friendly staff.

name: Edward Pava
text: What a horrible service at the pharmacy,  this people hate their job, they are miserable and rude. Not coming back to this place, CVS corporation should keep an eye at this location.

name: Unity Is The Key
text: Beware black beauty queens!!!  CVS stores do not honor black skin in beauty products in Opelika, Alabama!! Just sad!!!

name: Lura Gregory Reuber
text: Well i have mixed emotions about this place.On the one hand,the staff is very curious and informative but on the other hand they get scripts confused and it takes forever to transfer.They need to change sign out front because it is not a fast transfer.Their auto call messages are also unclear and not up to date.

name: Twyla Cooper
text: I love this place

name: Monica Thomas
text: Omg!!!! So slow

name: Holly Harrison
text: Nikki is amazing!! She knows her stuff and products she helped me with my hair and told me what to do and everything came out perfect. Very sweet and bubbly ! Will be back to see her again.

name: Shirley Nicholson
text: Got the supplies that I went there to get and the employees was great

name: Kipper Johnson
text: A good store to find hair products at

name: Wendy Thomas
text: They always have my hair products on hand

name: Ruby Bonds
text: Good place for hair products

name: Falon Hall
text: Customer service was good as always, they had just what i needed.

name: alexandra clements
text: The ladies that work here are a God send. THANKS FOR THE HELP with the toner and the instructions cause everything worked perfectly. Love this store. Thanks Pam!!

name: Kristin Howell
text: I've gone in here several times over the last few months for hair color and the particular employee I have dealt with has been extremely helpful and knowledgable about the products. I've had help from a few different but this young lady seems to know more than the others who just seem to work there. The only thing I will say negative is that they aren't always properly stocked on items and seem to not have them in the correct places at times so the color samples are wrong. If not for that I would give 5 stars

name: Mary Beth Lassitter
text: The ladies that have either been working when I have been there or that i have spoken to whenever I have called have always been fabulous!  I have never had a bad experience here.  I will continue to shop here as well as recommend to all of my friends!

name: K K
text: I’ve been a customer with sally beauty for many many years. I’ve always been treated nicely everytime I’ve been in everyone has always been very nice and helpful until recently. There is a new woman there with red hair and wears glasses I think I heard an employee call her sherry? She was rude to me while in the middle of asking a question she told me to hang on. text: One of the pharmaceutical technicians texted my prescription information to someone that was not myself, which is a major HIPPA violation!! Not only did she text someone about my prescription, she did it on her own time, with her personal phone number. I called and made a complaint, CVS said that they would call me back, which they did not. When I tried to get my prescription transferred to Walgreens, CVS put the Walgreens employee on hold for 25 mins and hung up on them, twice. Would not recommend using this pharmacy, who knows when someone is giving out your information.

name: Stephanie Todd
text: Price suddenly went up on a routine prescription and now calling to find out why but of course no one answers the phone! Literally been waiting for 40 min now and don't expect them to pick up anytime soon!!
